author: David A. Embury
description: A beautifully balanced, flavoursome medley of sweet and sour.
name: Bolero Sour
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into an ice-filled glass
